item.title: Canal Ride To Stadium
item.description: Ride Details Location Pedal Haus Brewery 85 W Boston St, Chandler, AZ 85225 Date Saturday, December 3rd, 2022 @ 8:00am Event Link Facebook Link Description This is the infamous canal ride from Chandler to Peoria. We will tour a series of canals around town. Sag stops at gas stations & maybe a taco stand or two. If you can’t make the full ride, plan to jump in with us for part of the ride.
